mapper.insert: if exists (select 1 from device_state where produceID=#{produceID} and deviceID=#{deviceID}) begin update device_state set state=#{state} where produceID=#{produceID} and deviceID=#{deviceID} end else begin insert device_state (deviceID,state,produceID) values (#{deviceID},#{state},#{produceID}) end
mapper.select: select * from device_state where produceID=#{produceID} and deviceID=#{deviceID}
